name: The Rain Thief
description:
Rain has been taken away from your village. Steal the ancient artifact from another civilization and save what's left of your people.

You play as a thief who has come from an arid land that has never seen rain. Save your village but in the process kill many innocent people.

Controls:
Movement : W-A-S-D Keys
Attack : E key
